room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Questburgh Escape Room in Pittsburgh
room_description:
Come aboard the pirate ship and try to find all the treasures that were buried near Ohio River. Watch the time! You have only 60 minutes to find the mysterious treasure. Work as a team: you have only one hour to escape the ship with the treasure before the ghosts of the pirate crew return to seek their revenge.
There is a kids version of the game available. Children from 5 to 9 years old must be accompanied by an adult. Children ranging from 10 to 16 may play without any adult supervision. The game monitored by the staff, to ensure safety and fun!
